start_boss.text: Ready to provide cover for the fleet!
The reliable anchor, ready for action!

retreat.text: Get us some space gunnery! Helmsman, pull us back!

out_of_missiles.text: Tactical reports that we've used all missiles!
We've used all of our ordinance $playerHonorific!

engaged.text: No enemy will get by us!
Our guns will keep this line intact!

need_help.text: Send escorts! This is too much!

running.text: Diverting power to the main engines!
IFF and trackers ready! We'll see you soon $playerHonorific.

hull_50.text: Engineering is reporting casaulties in our Damage Control teams!
Our hull integrity is at 50%! We're not invincible $playerHonorific!
Gunnery just took a hit! We're alright - for now.
Keep working! We're not going out without a fight!

hull_30.text: $playerHonorific, my staff is recommending a retreat!
Our damage control groups are overwhelmed!

overload.text: Helmsman! Use the armor to absorb the shots!
We've overloaded! Hard reboot is in progress!
Active Flux Vent in progress! Keep the crew off the hull!
Get the temperature control on in here! It's getting too hot!

death.text: I'm going down $playerHonorific! It's been an honor!
The hull is fracturing! We have to evacuate!

victory.text: It's an honor to fight by such a skilled tactician's side.
I feel like medals are in order!
